install.name: Facebook Like Box
install.author: Sunento Wu
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2010 Sunento Wul. All rights reserved.
install.description: Facebook Like Box is a social module that enables Facebook Page owners to attract and gain Likes from their own website. The Like Box enables users to: see how many users already like this page, and which of their friends like it too, read recent posts from the page and Like the page with one click, without needing to visit the page.

field.name: pageID
field.label: Facebook Page ID (Leave this blank if you have Page URL)
field.description: The ID of the Facebook Page for this Like Box. You can leave this as blank if you have Fabebook Page URL filled up above

param.name: width
param.label: Width
param.description: The Width of the module in pixes

param.name: height
param.label: Height
param.description: The Height of the module in pixes

param.name: colorScheme
param.label: Color Scheme
param.description: The color scheme for the plugin. Options: 'light', 'dark'.

param.name: showFaces
param.label: Show Faces
param.description: Show profile photos in the plugin.

param.name: connection
param.label: Connections
param.description: Show a sample of this many users who have liked this Page

param.name: streams
param.label: Streams
param.description: Show the profile stream for Public Profile

param.name: header
param.label: Header
param.description: Show the Find Us on Facebook bar at top. Only shown when either stream or connections are present
